channel.title: Jframe Error :(
channel.description:
I am making my own jframe for my client and i cannot seem to get it to compile. All i have is 2 simple tabs. A "File" tab and a "Tools" tab which both hardly dont have anything inside of them. Everytime i compile i just get this error. [code].\GUI.java:89: error: method addActionListener in class AbstractButton cannot be applied to given types; menuItem.addActionListener(this); ^ required: ActionListener found: GUI reason: actual argument GUI cannot be converted to ActionListener by method in vocation conversion .\GUI.java:101: error: method addActionListener in class AbstractButton cannot b e applied to given types; menuItem.addActionListener(this); ^ required: ActionListener found: GUI reason: actual argument GUI cannot be converted to ActionListener by method in vocation conversion 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Somebody Please help.... :mad: :mad: :mad:
Edit: I already have a jframe iam making a toolbar.

item.title: Jframe Error :(
item.dc:creator: @Colemann Colemann
item.description:
@Colemann wrote:

I am making my own jframe for my client and i cannot seem to get it to compile. All i have is 2 simple tabs. A “File” tab and a “Tools” tab which both hardly dont have anything inside of them. Everytime i compile i just get this error. .\GUI.java:89: error: method addActionListener in class AbstractButton cannot be applied to given types; menuItem.addActionListener(this); ^ required: ActionListener found: GUI reason: actual argument GUI cannot be converted to ActionListener by method in vocation conversion .\GUI.java:101: error: method addActionListener in class AbstractButton cannot b e applied to given types; menuItem.addActionListener(this); ^ required: ActionListener found: GUI reason: actual argument GUI cannot be converted to ActionListener by method in vocation conversion 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . Somebody Please help… :mad: :mad: :mad:

Edit: I already have a jframe iam making a toolbar.
